projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive personal website to showcase my skills and projects using Node.js, Express, and Handlebars.

projects.title: AI Resume Screening Tool
projects.description: An intelligent CV screening tool that leverages DeepSeek API to analyze and score large volumes of resumes based on job descriptions, providing alignment scores and detailed explanations.

projects.title: Differentiated QoS Simulation in ns-3
projects.description: A network simulation project for CS621 that implements a base class for differentiated services in the ns-3 simulator, including Strict Priority Queuing (SPQ) and Deficit Round Robin (DRR) scheduling mechanisms. The simulation was validated with a 3-node topology and evaluated for fairness and throughput using multiple bulk data flows.
